verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya adhīśvara
jaya nityānanda pūrṇānanda-kalevara

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—to Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; adhīśvara—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; jaya—all glories; nityānanda—to Lord Nityānanda; pūrṇa-ānanda—filled with transcendental pleasure; kalevara—His body.
translation: All glories to Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya, the Supreme Personality of Godhead! All glories to Lord Nityānanda, whose body is always filled with transcendental bliss!
